name: Weight Of A Soul
description:
After the visit of your child, you awake from your slumber, dead-set on coming back home for one last time. Fight the ghoulish fiends that try and take over your grave, and escape the grasp of the grim reaper as you wait for the sun to rise.

Controls: Mouse or Keyboard

Endless mode is unlocked once you complete story mode, endless mode includes special dialogue.
